bpp/descriptor.name: Kiko Live
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Kiko Live began with a simple and unique idea - to digitize and empower the local neighborhood retailers. From kiranas to pharmacies, from stationeries to paan-wallahs,from fashion to electronics, every local retailer can come on to our platform and use our app to organize and grow their home delivery business. Additionally, helps sellers sell to millions of new potential buyers on the ONDC network and exponentially grow their business.

descriptor.short_desc: Balram Restaurant is more than just a place to buy groceries—it's a community hub where loc
descriptor.long_desc: Balram Restaurant is more than just a place to buy groceries—it's a community hub where locals come together to connect, share stories, and celebrate food in all its glorious forms.

descriptor.long_desc: Farmhouse pizza is loaded with various fresh vegetarian toppings. Crunchy and crisp capsicum, juicy tomatoes, and succulent mushrooms are the prime toppings in a farmhouse pizza

descriptor.long_desc: A refreshing 2x filling of red and black kidney beans patty, topped with 2x aromatic Mexican seasoning to spice up your palette. Some items may not be available in all markets. Prices and participation may vary.
